channel.title: Where to add cache for Mac! Help me please!
channel.description: Im trying to get trisidiax v3 working on my mac just for shits and giggles but i have no clue where to put the cache. Please help me!!

item.title: Where to add cache for Mac! Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

The cache is most likely being read from the C:/ drive. since a mac doesnt have a C:/ drive you need to make it so the cache is being read from a path from a mac.

Go into signlink.java and change the C://

To this

Hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: Where to add cache for Mac! Help me please!
